as of March 2023, only the 2016 version

Universal Dependencies website is the information hub for Universal Dependencies: the list of currently available UD treebanks, the logic UD annotation scheme, language-specific UD annotation guidelines, how to contribute your own treebank, commonly used tools to query or annotate UD treebanks, and much more.
To use these models, you have to install the tool UDPipe binary version at least 1.2, which you can download from this website
